tapVoiceButton.ios: Tap the voice button below to get started
tapVoiceButton.android: Tap the microphone button to add an expense

googleAssistantPrompt.android: Say "Hey Google, I just spent..." to get started

emptyState.recognitionUnavailable: Speech recognition is not available on this device
emptyState.grantPermissions: Grant Speech Recognition and Microphone permissions to use voice expense logging

voiceConfirmation.title: Please confirm this expense:
voiceConfirmation.trySayingExample: Try saying: 'I just spent 20 dollars on coffee'

voice.willStopAuto: Will stop automatically when you finish speaking
voice.enterNaturally: Enter your expense naturally, like: 'I just spent 20 dollars for tea'

message.unavailable: Speech recognition is not available on this device. Voice recording features require speech recognition support.

platformNotes.capitalization: Use Title Case for UI labels and messages

settings.title: Settings
settings.currencyFooter: All expenses will be displayed in your selected currency.
settings.name: Name

onboarding.welcomeMessage: Track your expenses effortlessly with voice commands
onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: We've pre-selected your currency based on your location. You can change it below.
onboarding.helperText: You can choose a different currency for expense tracking below
onboarding.permissionsMessage: We need microphone and speech recognition access to enable voice expense logging
onboarding.currencyMessage: Choose your default currency for expense tracking

errors.noMicrophonePermission: Microphone permission is required. Please enable it in Settings.
errors.noSpeechPermission: Speech recognition permission is required. Please enable it in Settings.
errors.speechRecognitionFailed: Could not understand speech. Please try again.
errors.couldNotParseExpense: Could not parse expense from speech. Please try again.
errors.invalidAmount: Invalid amount detected. Please try again.
errors.categoryNotRecognized: Category not recognized. Using 'Other' as default.
errors.recognitionNotAvailable: Speech recognition is not available on this device

permissions.microphoneMessage: Just Spent needs access to your microphone to record voice expenses
permissions.speechRecognitionMessage: Just Spent needs speech recognition to convert your voice to text
permissions.bothPermissionsMessage: Just Spent needs both microphone and speech recognition access to enable voice expense logging
